title: London, BL, Add. 17203
Digital Catalogue of Syriac Manuscripts in the British Library
Fragments of a life of Severus, patriarch of Antioch, written by the author, whose name is not mentioned in the portions extant, at the request of one Domitius.
displayTitleEnglish: London, BL, Add. 17203Digital Catalogue of Syriac Manuscripts in the British LibraryFragments of a life of Severus, patriarch of Antioch, written by the author, whose name is not mentioned in the portions extant, at the request of one Domitius.
colophons: Colophon Again, on fol. 16 b, there is a second colophon. ܗܠܝܢ ܟܕ ܠܚܘܦ̇ܛܟ ܐ̇ܫܬܡܥܬ: ܘܥܠ ܨܠܘ̈ܬܟ ܐ̇ܬܬܟܠܬ ܐܘ ܒܪܢܫܐ ܕܐܠܗܐ ܕܘܡܐܛ̣. ܐܝܟ ܡܫܘܚܬܐ ܕܚܝܠܐ ܕܐܝܬ ܒܝ̣ ܥ̇ܡܠܬ. ܏ܘܫ.
